comments.body: This section would be stronger if we added the error messages the user would see for each problem - for example (I'm making up the error message here, because I don't know what it is), "If your playbook fails with `datacenter not found`, make sure the datacenter you provided is available." For even stronger docs, add a short note on how to perform each troubleshooting step (again, I'm totally making up this example): " . . . make sure the datacenter you provided is available by typing `vmware datacenter show`." And for the third level, add example output of the troubleshooting step.
I will add this in separate page with separate PR.

- Check if the datacenter you provided is available
- Check if the template specified exists and you have permissions to access the datastore
